alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 25 at 5:48PM MST until July 25 at 10:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected or ongoing. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following county, Maricopa. * WHEN...Until 900 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water on roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 548 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Phoenix. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
